name: Mount Pyres Ancestral Summit
description: High in the swirling mists rests a sacred vantage point where lingering spirits draw near. Monuments and memorials mark those who came before.

messages.enter: A hush settles as you crest the summit, ghostly silhouettes dancing just beyond view.
messages.look: Memorials and candles glow faintly through the mist, reflecting countless stories of those passed.
